languages.text: Улики, оставленные налетчиками в корабельном Святилище, ведут к палатам плазмадвигателя. Кибелле необходимо ослабить бдительность местных рабочих, среди которых могут таиться последователи Немезита, и заставить смутьянов выдать сначала себя, а потом и своего "героя".

The evidence left by the raiders in the voidship's shrine points to the plasma drive chambers. Kibellah must now ease the vigilance of the local workers, who may be harbouring followers of Nemesite. She will then force the troublemakers to reveal both themselves and, eventually, their so-called hero.
languages.original_text: Улики, оставленные налетчиками в корабельном Святилище, ведут к палатам плазмадвигателя. Кибелле необходимо ослабить бдительность местных рабочих, среди которых могут таиться последователи Немезита, и заставить смутьянов выдать сначала себя, а потом и своего "героя".

traits.locale_text: The evidence left by the raiders in the vessel's shrine points to the plasma drive's chambers. Kibellah needs to slacken the vigilance of the local workers, who may be harbouring followers of Nemesite, and force the troublemakers to reveal themselves and later their "champion".

She will then force the troublemakers to reveal both themselves and, eventually, their so-called hero.

The evidence left by the raiders in the voidship's shrine points to the plasma drive chambers. Kibellah must now ease the vigilance of the local workers, who may be harbouring followers of Nemesite. She will then force the troublemakers to reveal both themselves and, eventually, their so-called hero.

languages.text: Die von den Angreifern im Schrein des Raumschiffs zurückgelassenen Beweise deuten auf die Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern hin. Kibellah muss nun die Wachsamkeit der lokalen Arbeiter verringern, da diese Anhänger von Nemesit verstecken könnten. Anschließend wird sie die Unruhestifter zwingen, sich selbst und letztlich auch ihren sogenannten Helden preiszugeben.
languages.original_text: The evidence left by the raiders in the voidship's shrine points to the plasma drive chambers. Kibellah must now ease the vigilance of the local workers, who may be harbouring followers of Nemesite. She will then force the troublemakers to reveal both themselves and, eventually, their so-called hero.

traits.locale_text: Die von den Angreifern im Schrein des Raumschiffs zurückgelassenen Beweise deuten auf die Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern hin. Kibellah muss nun die Wachsamkeit der lokalen Arbeiter verringern, da diese Anhänger von Nemesit verstecken könnten. Anschließend wird sie die Unruhestifter zwingen, sich selbst und letztlich auch ihren sogenannten Helden preiszugeben.

languages.text: Las pruebas que dejaron los agresores en el templo de la nave del vacío apuntan a las cámaras del motor de plasma. Kibellah debe ganarse la confianza de los obreros locales, que podrían estar encubriendo a los seguidores de Nemesitio. Luego obligará a los agitadores a revelarse y, en última instancia, desenmascarar a su supuesto héroe.
languages.original_text: The evidence left by the raiders in the voidship's shrine points to the plasma drive chambers. Kibellah must now ease the vigilance of the local workers, who may be harbouring followers of Nemesite. She will then force the troublemakers to reveal both themselves and, eventually, their so-called hero.

traits.locale_text: Las pruebas que dejaron los agresores en el templo de la nave del vacío apuntan a las cámaras del motor de plasma. Kibellah debe ganarse la confianza de los obreros locales, que podrían estar encubriendo a los seguidores de Nemesitio. Luego obligará a los agitadores a revelarse y, en última instancia, desenmascarar a su supuesto héroe.

languages.text: ヴォイドシップの神殿に残された証拠から、プラズマドライブ室へと繋がった。キベラは今、ネメサイトの信者を匿っている可能性のある場所で、労働者たちの警戒を解かなければならない。そしてトラブルメーカーたちに正体を明かさせて、最終的に彼らのヒーローと呼ばれる者の正体も明かさせるのだ。
languages.original_text: The evidence left by the raiders in the voidship's shrine points to the plasma drive chambers. Kibellah must now ease the vigilance of the local workers, who may be harbouring followers of Nemesite. She will then force the troublemakers to reveal both themselves and, eventually, their so-called hero.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップの神殿に残された証拠から、プラズマドライブ室へと繋がった。キベラは今、ネメサイトの信者を匿っている可能性のある場所で、労働者たちの警戒を解かなければならない。そしてトラブルメーカーたちに正体を明かさせて、最終的に彼らのヒーローと呼ばれる者の正体も明かさせるのだ。

languages.text: 袭击者在礼拜堂内留下的所有痕迹都指向了等离子驱动室。考虑到当地工人可能会窝藏涅墨斯特，绮贝菈必须想办法让这些人放松警惕，揪出煽动暴乱的追随者，最终让他们所谓的英雄无所遁形。
languages.original_text: The evidence left by the raiders in the voidship's shrine points to the plasma drive chambers. Kibellah must now ease the vigilance of the local workers, who may be harbouring followers of Nemesite. She will then force the troublemakers to reveal both themselves and, eventually, their so-called hero.

traits.locale_text: 袭击者在礼拜堂内留下的所有痕迹都指向了等离子驱动室。考虑到当地工人可能会窝藏涅墨斯特，绮贝菈必须想办法让这些人放松警惕，揪出煽动暴乱的追随者，最终让他们所谓的英雄无所遁形。

languages.text: Les indices laissés par les assaillants dans le sanctuaire du vaisseau mènent tout droit aux salles des réacteurs à plasma. Kibellah doit à présent endormir la vigilance des ouvriers du secteur, au cas où il y aurait parmi eux des partisans de Némésite. Son objectif consiste à forcer les agitateurs à tomber le masque avant de lui livrer leur prétendu héros.
languages.original_text: The evidence left by the raiders in the voidship's shrine points to the plasma drive chambers. Kibellah must now ease the vigilance of the local workers, who may be harbouring followers of Nemesite. She will then force the troublemakers to reveal both themselves and, eventually, their so-called hero.

languages.text: Uçsuz gemisinin mabedine baskıncılar tarafından bırakılan kanıt, plazma iticisi odalarını işaret ediyor. Bölgedeki işçiler, Nemezit'in takipçilerini saklıyor olabilirler. Kibellah'nın şimdi teyakkuzdaki işçileri sakinleştirmesi gerekiyor. Ardından hem kendilerini hem de en nihayetinde sözüm ona kahramanlarını açığa çıkarmaları için baş belalarına baskı yapacak.
languages.original_text: The evidence left by the raiders in the voidship's shrine points to the plasma drive chambers. Kibellah must now ease the vigilance of the local workers, who may be harbouring followers of Nemesite. She will then force the troublemakers to reveal both themselves and, eventually, their so-called hero.
